column5: BAC Just reloaded 10k shares 2190 If the algo quant twats will drop it another 10 cents Ill go large once again My super liquid little cash machine LOLMeanwhile not trades but serious LT investment here for those inclined Even better upside though is ALK and UAL And for a spec TRVG imo is the easiest double f12m I have seen in a 35 yr money mgmt career
